interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult)
Review Date: 2020/10/07
Store: Vedory
Product Description: ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.']
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'}
Review Text: Theses are lightweight and fairly comfortable and are great for teachers or sales clerks or anyone who needs to talk a lot for their job.  They can clip on to your mask, or can just sit inside of it.  They are very lightweight and hold the mask comfortably away from your face for easier talking.
Review Title: Great for talkers
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog
JOYYUM
{'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '787414814279', 'Manufacturer': 'JOYYUM'}
I have mixed feelings about this dryer.  It does a nice job over all but has some problems.  It takes a bit for it to heat up and would take forever to actually dry wet hair. It works well on lightly damp hair.  It has a button that spins the barrel different direction and it’s quite easy to use, but the motor to turn the barrel isn’t very strong and it take a bit to get going.  My biggest complaint is the sound.  It is very loud with a high pitched wail this is especially problematic because you use it right next to your ear.
Very loud.
Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis Face Toner, 6.76 Fl Oz
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.85 x 2.76 x 7.44 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '501000', 'Manufacturer': 'Embryolisse'}
This is great toner. The scent is nice and it leaves my face feeling fresh and clean.
Nice scent

Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels
Monikahair
{'UPC': '739515020639'}
Wow! This foot peel is amazing. My feet are very calloused and dry and this works extremely well. I used this on a Wednesday and by Saturday my feet were starting to peel, by Sunday the were peeling a lot all over. Make sure you’re feet don’t need to be seen for a few days while they are in the peeling stage. It took 3 days for them to finish peeling, but now they look and feel so much better.
Amazing
CIBBCCI Eyeshadow Makeup Palette 16 Colors Pigmented Velvet Texture Blendable Neutral Warm Long Lasting Eye Shadow Pallet With Mirror
CIBBCCI
{'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'CIBBCCI', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 4.9 x 0.6 inches; 0.73 Ounces', 'UPC': '718689217120'}
This is a great pallet. The colors are highly pigmented so a little goes a long way. The powder feels light and smooth and is long lasting. The colors are so versatile and you can do many looks from day to evening, light and natural to dark and smokey. It also looks great on stage.
Versatile
minihope Women's Elastic Hair Tiea, Black, 120 Count (Pack of 1), 4MM for Medium Hair.Value pack.

These are great elastics.  They are sturdy and thick. They don’t snag or tangle on your hair and hold up for a long time. We go thrift them quick with 3 girls in the house so this pack is a great value for the money.
Great value

**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interests:** The user continues to have a strong focus on cosmetics, particularly high-quality eyeshadow palettes, while also showing a keen interest in practical beauty solutions. Their recent purchase of a mask bracket indicates a growing consideration for accessories that facilitate makeup maintenance, particularly for those needing to wear masks without compromising their lip products.

- **Performance Expectations:** Consistent with their prior approach, the user prioritizes efficient performance across personal care and cosmetic products, looking for items that enhance usability while delivering results. Their willingness to provide balanced ratings further reflects their commitment to recognizing quality in various beauty and self-care solutions.

- **Sensitivity to Noise:** The user's preference for personal care tools that operate quietly remains evident, reinforcing their focus on comfort in self-care routines.

- **Functionality vs. Quality:** The user's appreciation for innovative features in products continues, especially when those features offer practical benefits. Their recent experiences highlight a careful selection that ensures comfort, particularly in products like mask accessories that emphasize ease of use.

- **Overall Experience:** The user reviews products critically, generally opting for moderate ratings unless experiences are exceptional. Their positive acknowledgment of a recent accessory demonstrates an expanding acceptance of reliable and effective beauty solutions, maintaining their core values of performance, comfort, and quality.
